jobs.title: CMO/Senior Sales Manager
jobs.description:
We want to add a Senior Sales Manager to our family.

We’re looking for someone who can Clinch the Deal, will be responsible for the revenue target, dynamic, self-driven, and innovative who can identify potential clients show them how our brand can add value to their business, someone who likes to hustle, and is capable of thinking out of the box.

We have a very friendly, welcoming team and work environment, so this is the perfect place for someone who is willing to share his/her experience with us, learn and unlearn, to experiment, and to grow with us.

Key Responsibilities:
• You will proactively engage with both the senior stakeholders and co-founders to understand their business goals and help them to build an effective sales plan
• Develop and execute agency sales strategy and identify target sectors, responsible for agency sales and business development activities across India
• Analyse & prepare annual sales budgets, responsible for generating revenue & collection, establish strategic plans to achieve maximum profits, and expand customer base through extensive marketing
• Take calculated risks to increase profitability and brand recognition
• Manage existing & develop positive relationships with senior level across pan India. Holding groups establishing long-term relationships with the ability to influence customers
• Supporting Account Manager/Client Servicing Executive in delivery of commercial aspects of accounts
• Collaborate with Product Marketing to drive market development and client education through marketing, client events & PR activities
• Maximize the impact of clients advertising budgets by using a range of media resources thus helping the Client to create brand awareness
• Ensure that Clients get high class service and support, deliver a superior client experience by collaborating with our technical/product team
• Show thought leadership in local market and attendance at industry events with clients
• 5+ years of agency experience - digital marketing, branding, website design & development business
• Consistent track record of achieving sales objectives and demonstrable planning and forecasting skills
• Ability to visualize, prepare and present exciting content pitches to existing and prospective clients
• Capacity to build compelling storylines and data-driven presentations that are customized to client’s business and problems
• Experience with client and business development, on-boarding process and long-life cycle sales process

Requirements & Qualification:
• A Graduate/Post Graduate in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field
• Transformative approach to leadership that inspires and empowers others
• Drives strategies to increase product awareness by observing the market, competitors, and industry trends as well as projections for the future
• Ability to innovate and implement change successfully
• We expect you are/you have a great match to 3MD DNA: Open & Caring, Agile & Innovative, Ownership Mindset
• Proactivity, problem-solving ability, high level communication, negotiation, persuasive, account management skills
• Excellent interpersonal skills and able to communicate with stakeholders at all levels - internally as well as externally
• Ability to thrive under pressure and help the team to cope with it too
• Prioritize and handle multiple work responsibilities simultaneously
• Solutions & Result-oriented and able to work independently
• Solid computer skills and awareness of web-based marketing and social media
• Driven and committed to success while maintaining integrity

What can you gain from this role?
• Opportunity to take ownership on pan India requirements
• Career opportunity in a fast-paced, high-growth startup environment
• The entrepreneurial and dynamic work setting
• The informal style of communication and management
• Salary package according to qualification and experience

jobs.title: Client Servicing
jobs.description:
Job Description

Serve as a day-to-day point of client contact,
Manage client feedback and de-briefing for internal teams
Research and prepare client presentations, reports and conduct in-person client meetings
Research on industry & competitor trends to apply best practices to client portfolio
Understanding client goals/objectives and their creative requirements including Branding, Packaging, UI/UX Design, Social Media, Content Development, Web Development, Graphic Design, Digital Marketing & more
Work jointly with the internal team to drive strategy & development
Identify growth opportunities from the client portfolio and drive revenue by upselling
Research & keep current on emerging online trends and best practices within the Creative Digital Industry

Desired Candidate Profile

- Minimum of 3+ years experience managing clients in a Creative Digital Agency
- Great communication, presentation skills, and client servicing skills
- Experience in dealing with digital media publishers
- Excellent time management and organizational skills
- Proactive and a self-starter
- Strategic thinker with hands-on experience

jobs.title: Creative Copywriter
jobs.description:
Job Description:
- Understand client brief and execute it in required written formats, both Long & Short Formats
- Creating ideas that can be used across various platforms to support campaigns
- An avid researcher in order to churn out content with credible information
- Have to be a team player and innovative in their ideas
- Executing tasks with the flair and professionalism needed to push the agency and clients in the right direction

We are looking for someone with:
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
An impressive conceptual outlook and ability to produce original ideas
High-level creative thinking and the confidence to use it
Multiple disciplines embracing the various roles required throughout a project
The confidence to share and present ideas internally and externally
Motivation and the desire to execute every job to the highest standard
The ability to deliver campaigns that generate results
The ability to think laterally and literally
Positive attitude over experience

Why join us?
1. Versatility: You will get to meet and learn from people belonging to different walks of life
2. Problem Solving: We love problems and solving them gives us a high!
3. Innovation: Building a product for the future requires constant brainstorming, innovating and generating ideas
4. Open Culture: We believe in working together with no bars and boundaries. Our CEO sits next to us! Data-Driven: As much as we trust your gut feeling, we also trust data. Data is why you are doing what you are doing.
5. Transparency: We are no mind readers. So tell us whatever it is, however it is, and we will hear you. Move fast: We all are fighting against time, and whatever best you create in the limited time, we are happy to implement, measure and make change and
6. Outcome-Oriented: We put in a lot of hard work and time, so we like to see the output at the end of the day
7. Other Benefits: Reward & recognition, Work from home, Flexible Working hours, Casual Dress, Paid holidays or sick leave, Games & Entertainment, Parties & Fun

Perks and Benefits:
1. Work at Scale and challenge yourself
2. Free to choose your own tech gear
3. Work with a smart team which grew up
4. Caffeine all day. TT table, Pool Table, Indoor Cricket in office, Team outings

Note: Candidates should have their own laptop.

jobs.title: Do exciting projects in UI/UX Internship
jobs.description:
What is the Job like?

 Work on website, enterprise applications (multichannel), embedded product UI’s

 Translate high-level design requirements into wireframes and engaging, intuitive and functional user interfaces

 Ability to execute visual designs at all stages of the project. From conceptual to finalization and handover

 Ability to create visual design concepts, style guides, and design documents

 Conduct expert/heuristic evaluation reviews of the products and services. Providing design recommendations.

 Collaborate with product management and engineering teams to implement innovative solutions

 Work closely with the developer team, manage and maintain designs to meet customer needs, validate and ensure delivering world-class experiences

 Participate in design discussions and collaborative sessions with teams and stakeholders, offering and providing feedback on concepts and ideas to evolve experience

 Create mood boards, mind maps and be a part of brainstorming sessions

 Deliver high fidelity schematics, workflows, interaction storyboards, and design deliverables that guide creative, content, and development efforts

 Be a productive and additive teammate, actively helping leaders and peers to raise the bar while also capitalizing on ideas from others

 Knowledge of Mobile, Tablet, and Desktop design constraints and patterns
What are we looking for?

 A talented UI Designer with keen eye to details, a storyteller and a problem solver

 Excellent understanding of typography, Color, Layout

 Strong verbal and writing skills, ability to tell a story around an experience or solution

 Fluency in creating user flows, wireframes and prototypes preferably on Adobe CS, Sketch, Microsoft Office, Axure etc

 Contributes to building a design-centric work culture


Note: Candidates should carry their laptop at work

Interested & eligible candidates can share their resume & work portfolio on hr@3mindsdigital.com

#hiring #mumbai #uiuxinternships #recruitment #agency

jobs.title: Internship: Graphic Designer in Mumbai
jobs.description:
College life is amazing, and transitioning into a office-goer seems so impossible. Wouldn’t it be wonderful to have an office that is like a recreation of your college life? Do you aspire to work in a flexible office culture that lets you explore design ideas that make you restless and keep you awake at nights?

What if we told you, we have exactly what you are looking for. 

3 Minds Digital is looking for a Visual Designer with a great design sense, a fiery passion and the ability to handle responsibility.   Our company is based in Mumbai and London, and has worked with corporates like TATA, Ingram Micro, Mitashi, JSW as well as startups like RNO, 4th wheel etc. 

We believe in the power of detailing and are ardent believers of innovation and originality. So, have a Eureka moment, and we will be there to help you revel in your success. 

We are a team looking for an equally enthusiastic and fun team member to work with and be a part of our office shenanigans. 

REQUIREMENTS 
• An interesting design portfolio.
• Excellent visual design skills.
• Ability to think critically, solve problems creatively and effectively. 
• Updated with the latest design trends.
• The ability to work in a space with a constant flow of jokes. 

MANDATORY SKILLS
• Adobe Photoshop.
• Adobe Illustrator.
• Problem-solving.
• Attention to detail.
• Ability to meet deadlines.
• Strong Conceptualizing and Visualization ability
